[Random Assortment of Things] The Exotech faction can be seen as an exploration encounter. It can be hard to find in sectors with increased size, but they can occasionally be spotted by a large ping in hyperspace when they enter a new system.

[Random Assortment of Things] The Abyssal Depths can be seen as mid-game content. Overpreparing can make it more difficult to explore, due to a large fleet's increased sensor profile and supply consumption.
[Random Assortment of Things] The Abyssal Depths can almost entirely be cleared through stealth, it is up to you which fights to take, or up to your mistakes.
